snippet.title: Horror Short Film "The Herd" | Uncensored Cut | Director Melanie Light | ALTER
snippet.description:
A number of kidnapped and trafficked women find themselves imprisoned in a squalid medical facility. Escape, on any level, is seemingly impossible as the women are condemned to a life of enforced servitude at the whims of their captors for one reason only – their milk.

“The Herd” by Melanie Light

Subscribe to ALTER on YouTube: https://goo.gl/LnXRC3

#ALTER #horror #shortfilm

About ALTER:
The most provocative minds in horror bring you three new short films every week exploring the human condition through warped and uncanny perspectives. 
 
Be ready to leave the world you know behind and subscribe. Once you watch, you are forever ALTERed.

Connect with Melanie Light:
Website: www.melanielight.co.uk
Follow Melanie Light on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/misartressmel
Follow Melanie Light on Twitter: https://twitter.com/MisartressMel 

Watch more: https://goo.gl/yvB7EM 
Website: watchalter.com
Follow us on Facebook: https://goo.gl/X4LhGr
Follow us on Instagram: https://goo.gl/G6W7zn 
Sign-up for ALTER newsletter: http://eepurl.com/dChYXb

About Gunpowder + Sky:
Creating content that resonates and impacts pop culture conversation, by empowering creators to take risks and experiment relentlessly in the pursuit of novel stories and formats.
